Detailed Description

BtDeviceListBidirectionalIterator is the base class for all BtDeviceListXXXIterators. It encapsules the common properties for all iterators like the actual position for this iterator

Member Function Documentation

const BtDeviceListNode* BtDeviceList::BtDeviceListBidirectionalIterator::GetDeviceListNode (   )  const [inline, protected]
 

Get current node.

GetDeviceListNode returns the node within a BtDeviceList representing the current position of this iterator.

Returns:
A pointer to a BtDeviceListNode representing the current position of this iterator.

void BtDeviceList::BtDeviceListBidirectionalIterator::SetDeviceListNode (  BtDeviceListNode *  device_list_node  )  [protected]
 

Set current node.

SetDeviceListNode sets a node to become the current position within a BtDeviceList repesented by this iterator.

Parameters:
device_list_node A pointer to a BtDeviceListNode that should be the new current positin for this iterator.
